ISSUE.TITLE: Question on new checkmark and music note
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: feel like a stupid question - but what does the checkmark vs. the music note do now in the interface? If I click on them, they play the alarm once. Haven't been able to play the combinations from computer vs. phone, during high vs. low, etc. I know the code is ✓♪ So I think it's just to test it manually... just confirming.
